thread.title: Top USA Gymnastics Board Members Resign Amid Sex Abuse Scandal

author: Rebecca Davis O’Brien
title: Top USA Gymnastics Board Members Resign Amid Sex Abuse Scandal
text:
The chairman of USA Gymnastics and two other board members resigned Monday, the organization said, following weeks of internal dissent and public outcry over the board’s handling of a sexual abuse scandal involving the former women’s national team doctor.
The move also came amid mounting pressure from the U.S. Olympic Committee, a person familiar with the matter said. The gymnastics world has been roiled for the past 18 months by revelations that former longtime USA Gymnastics team physician Larry Nassar sexually abused athletes...
